just a sec
have you tried to disable the connection in the Network Settings
did you ever say if you disabled the connection or not? I must have missed that
System > Administration > Networking
then click on your dial-up connection and disable it
as long as you don't need it enabled, then you should be good to go.....restart your machine and see if it tries after you login....
clicking disable completely disabled my dialup
umm, yes....
I've honestly not used dialup on ubuntu, just was suggesting a way you could stop it from auto-dialing as that's what you were asking.....
